job_title: Hospital Screener in North Bay, ON
pros: Friendly staff, community involvement, career advancement opportunities, hard-working team members
cons: Depending on department may get a lot of call ins which can be good or bad depending on if you like a lot of extra shifts or feel pressured by it

job_title: Personal Support Work Psw in West Nipissing, ON
pros: Good place to work, make lots of hours at a decent wage. They do try to take advantage of PSWs though by delegating tasks that are our of scope of practice.
cons: Downside, hours are not stable as a part time worker and it is difficult to get any full time position.

job_title: Personal Support Work Psw in Sturgeon Falls, ON
pros: Colleagues are the best people. They care
cons: Management doesn’t care about the staff at all

job_title: Registered Practical Nurse in Sturgeon Falls, ON
cons: Horrible work/life balance. Overworks their employees to the point of burnout.
